comment: Professor Case got me excited for CAD. He knows how to navigate SolidWorks very well. Show up to class and download SolidWorks on your laptop/PC and you will pass with flying colors.
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: GO TO CLASS! You'll be behind if you don't.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Hes an amazing professor that really knows what hes doing. As long as you show up to class its pretty hard to fail.
Teaches solidworks really well, assignments due once or twice a week. Show up and do your stuff and you'll be ok
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: Case was a very good teacher that got me excited about CAD and taught very well how to use CAD and taught all of the basics very simply. The class was an all round joy and a very fun place to be.

All around I had a really good experience with him for EDG1211. He is very knowledgeable when it comes to Solidworks and drafting and is very good at explaining how to navigate to program efficiently. His class was extremely well paced and anyone from a complete beginner to someone with a decent amount of Cad experience can have something to gain.
